bill.title: Motor vehicle privilege tax laws; increase penalties for certain violations of.
bill.description: An Act To Amend 27-19-57, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Penalty For Registering A Vehicle In A County Other Than The County In Which The Vehicle Should Be Registered; To Amend Section 27-19-59, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Allow Tax Collectors To Obtain Additional Information Necessary To Determine Where To Register A Vehicle; To Amend Section 27-19-63, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Penalty That May Be Imposed On A Person Who Is Liable For The Motor Vehicle Privilege Tax But Displays An Out-of-state License Tag On A Vehicle; To Amend Section 27-19-131, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize An Additional Fine For Operating A Vehicle Displaying An Out-of-state License Tag In Violation Of The Motor Vehicle Privilege Tax Laws; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-133, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes Law Enforcement Officers To Arrest Persons For Violations Of The Motor Vehicle Privilege Tax Laws, For The Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
